title: Broken SIMD run-make test

labels.name: A-testsuite
labels.description: Area: The testsuite used to check the correctness of rustc

body:
Whenever I run `make all && make check-stage2` on a particular Linux machine, `x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/test/run-make/simd-ffi-2-T-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu-H-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu.ok` fails:

```
error: could not copy "/opt/rust/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/test/run-make/simd-ffi/simd.0.s" to "/opt/rust/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/test/run-make/simd-ffi/simd.s": couldn't copy path (the source path is not an existing file; from="/opt/rust/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/test/run-make/simd-ffi/simd.0.s"; to="/opt/rust/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/test/run-make/simd-ffi/simd.s")
error: failed to remove /opt/rust/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/test/run-make/simd-ffi/simd.0.s: couldn't unlink path (no such file or directory (No such file or directory); path=/opt/rust/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/test/run-make/simd-ffi/simd.0.s)
error: could not copy "/opt/rust/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/test/run-make/simd-ffi/simd.0.ll" to "/opt/rust/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/test/run-make/simd-ffi/simd.ll": couldn't copy path (the source path is not an existing file; from="/opt/rust/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/test/run-make/simd-ffi/simd.0.ll"; to="/opt/rust/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/test/run-make/simd-ffi/simd.ll")
error: failed to remove /opt/rust/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/test/run-make/simd-ffi/simd.0.ll: couldn't unlink path (no such file or directory (No such file or directory); path=/opt/rust/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/test/run-make/simd-ffi/simd.0.ll)
```
